fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, run a study on the benefits of your company. Choose one of the below to learn:
- 3 random players who are not opposed to your faction
- The role of the last promoted player
- What evil actions have been performed tonight (but not on what players those actions have been performed)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - After running 3 studies on your company, you gain access to your second ability: "Lie". At night, you may lie to a player, learning what their role by lying to them. One use.
